title: The Gold Card
summary: The document is an executive order titled 'The Gold Card,' issued on September 19, 2025. It outlines a new visa program overseen by the Secretary of Commerce, aimed at facilitating the entry of aliens who make significant financial contributions to the United States. The program, known as the Gold Card, requires a $1 million gift from individuals or $2 million from corporations to qualify for expedited visa processing. The funds will be used to promote American commerce and industry. The order also details the implementation process, including application procedures, fees, and the potential expansion of the program. The purpose of the order is to realign immigration policy with national interests, prioritizing individuals who can benefit the country economically.
